thread.title: MRC offers free tennis lessons through October
thread.title_full: MRC offers free tennis lessons through October

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: MRC offers free tennis lessons through October
text:
MRC offers free tennis lessons through October Lessons for those new to sport, who have never played By Staff | Oct 09, 2015 
Rockport — The Midcoast Recreation Center will offer free tennis lessons for anyone new to the sport or who has never before played. 
The promotion extends through October and the 30-minute lessons are offered by head teaching professional Seth Meyer. 
“Tennis is such a wonderful lifetime sport,” says Meyer. “We want to introduce the game to as many people as possible.” 
Available days and times vary and space is limited, with the offer good for juniors and adults of any experience level. 
For more information, email Meyer at seth@midcoastrec.org. 
Courier Publications' sports staff can be reached by email at sports@villagesoup.com or by phone at 594-4401.
